attributes.additional_details:
Eco-couple told to pull down their 'hobbit home' made entirely out of natural materials . . . but without planning permission.

We want Pembrokeshire County Council to declare their home suitable for living in (like they have already done so for years perfectly fine). This is GODS land, nobody owns it and nobody can tell anybody where they can and can't build, or that is how it should be. They built without planning permission, we want Pembrokeshire County Council to grant them that permission and let them carry on living in their HOME.
